brief_title: Study of BMS-275183 in Patients With Pre-treated Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to learn if BMS-275183 can shrink or slow the growth of the cancer in subjects with non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC). The safety of this treatment will also be studied.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Advanced or metastatic pretreated NSCLC - Measurable disease - Adequate hematologic, hepatic and renal functions - ECOG Performance Status of 0-2 Exclusion Criteria: - Inability to swallow capsules - Recent significant cardiovascular disease - Woman who are pregnant or breastfeeding
